name: Two Rivers — North Pier
notes: Handles S–E winds. Southerlies build more for northbound fetch; piers can clean it a bit.

name: Manitowoc — South Pier
notes: SE blows in nicely; east can be chunky.

name: Sheboygan — North Point
notes: Classic. Takes a variety of easterlies; NE fetch lights it up.

name: Port Washington
notes: NE favors longer fetch; possible wind shadow on due south.
